text: No k’ubw’imvugo yabo igira iti "Rwose twishe Mesiya Isa (Yesu) mwene Mariyamu (Mariya), Intumwa ya Allah". Nyamara ntibamwishe ntibanamubambye; ahubwo (bishe kandi banabamba) uwahawe ishusho ye. Kandi mu by’ukuri, babandi batabivuzeho rumwe, baracyamushidi- kanyaho (bibaza niba uwishwe yari Yesu cyangwa usa nawe). Nta bumenyi nyakuri babifiteho usibye gukurikira ibyo bakeka. Kandi rwose ntibamwishe
